name: 1 - Geotextile strength and filtration classes as specified on drawings or within MRTS27
2 - Geotextile stored on site under protective covers, off the ground and in a manner unaffected by heat. Rolls clearly marked with manufacturer, type and batch.
3 - Proposed Geotextile submitted to and accepted by Adminstrator for acceptability to Cl6.
4 - Geotextiles installed as specified in the contract
5 - Area cleared and graded with all sharp objects and large stones removed and covered within 48hours of being placed
6 - Where batch size is >5000m2, sampling and testing undertaken according to Cl10.2. An area not less than 15m2 shall be sampled.
7 - Where directed, an additional testing sample is provided to the administrator
8 - Geotextile not placed until administrator accepts test results
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Max. Lot Size, Min. Testing Frequency, Min. No. of Tests
10 - Testing of in situ/imported soil/fill material carried out in accordance with test methods: Q101, Q103A and/or Q103C
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Two tests per 5000m3
